entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
